parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.68
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the velocity (speed vector) of the given vehicle relative to its model.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''setVelocityModelSpace''' [x, y, z]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [x, y, z]: [[Array]] - relative direction vector

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>car [[setVelocityModelSpace]] [0, 10, 0]; //pushes car forward</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[velocityModelSpace]], [[velocity]], [[setVelocity]], [[setVelocityTransformation]], [[speed]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
